title: Looking For A Team in Bronze V or any Bronze.
body: Ive Been Stuck in Bronze V for about a month now. It isnot for lack of skill no but i get a lot of trolling douche teams (excuse language). i wanna level and get better and advance through the Tiers. Im looking for a team to join i play every night. so im always on. hit us up wit han invite to your team i would love to play some good games of league

replies.body:
>  It isnot for lack of skill no but i get a lot of trolling douche teams (excuse language).

You get trolls and douches at every rank. And you literally have the lowest winrate I've ever seen. No offense, but there's no way thats your teams fault. The sooner you accept that, the sooner you can actually improve.
i would love to join, i also am in bronze 5 i have a good enough skillcap that i shouldnt be in bronze 5 but my teams are so bad and just troll most the time would love to play with you sometime :D
With respect, they're not trolling, B5 is just very, very bad. Been B4 myself a few seasons ago and thought I did belong there. I did. I was bad.
IhakaNZ I'd love to join. i just sent a request i am also bronze 5 while last season i was bronze 3 XD i really wanna get out of bronze 5 i main adc {{champion:67}} and top lane {{champion:64}}

I Would love to join you dude im Bronze 2 and i was silver 3 last season i would be happy to join ya team i main
{{champion:32}} jg and i play {{champion:36}}  or {{champion:92}} top :)
